item.title: Urfan Sharif must spend a minimum of 40 years in prison and Beinash Batool must serve 33 years. Sara's uncle, Faisal Malik, is jailed for 16 years for causing or allowing the death of a child - he was found not guilty of murder. #SaraSharif #BreakingNews
